definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

Qianmen subway station on Beijing Subway Line 2
front door/main entrance/honest and upright approach (as opposed to 後門|后门, back-door or under the counter)

enceinte of a city gate/barbican entrance to a city

side street/road branching from the main street
